Name: Crystal Raiders VR
About the game: Crystal Raiders VR is a Virtual Reality action game taking place in magical dwarven castles. Complete challenging levels alone or in a party up to 4 players using your problem solving skills and cunning. Discover the pieces of the lost alchemist's artifact and help the dwarves to repair the machine to save their home world. With the weapon of your choice, crush the animated crystal guardians, reveal secrets and overcome various obstacles in unique hand crafted levels. All this while avoiding deadly traps and ambushes. Collect treasures and experience from each level to customize your weaponâ€™s powers and the look of your character. Hand crafted levels with increasing difficulty, hidden areas and treasures. Arena survival mode. Challenging Boss encounters. Co-op option up to 4 players. Weapon upgrades. Character customization. Family friendly experience But most importantly, don't be a chicken!
